references.paper_title: Facilitating multi-turn function calling for LLMs via compositional instruction tuning
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for enhancing LLMs' ability to handle multi-turn function calls, a key aspect of complex function calling.

references.paper_title: T-eval: Evaluating the tool utilization capability of large language models step by step
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel benchmark, T-Eval, which focuses on evaluating LLMs' tool usage capabilities step-by-step, addressing limitations of existing methods.
This paper explores enhancing LLMs with real-time APIs, a crucial aspect of the ComplexFuncBench benchmark's focus on real-world scenarios.

references.paper_title: Training verifiers to solve math word problems
references.reason: This paper highlights the limitations of LLMs in real-time factual knowledge, a key motivation behind enhancing LLMs with external tools and APIs.
This paper provides a broader context by highlighting the general challenges in evaluating large language models' abilities across various tasks, including those involving function calls.
